    max-height: 650px;
    object-fit: cover;
    object-position: center center;
}
.page-banner-main.banner-head-law .slideshow_align_caption{ display: flex; justify-content: flex-end; align-items: flex-end; height: 100%; }
.page-banner-main.banner-head-law .slide-btn{ letter-spacing: 1px; font-size: 22px; background: #fff; color: #011f43 !important; }
.page-banner-main.banner-head-law .slide-btn.red-btn{ background: #862632; color: #fff !important; }

.two-column-grid .icon-style-2 .avia-icon-list li { background: #fff; font-weight: 400; border-width: 1px 0 0 0; }
.two-column-grid .icon-style-2 .avia-icon-list li .iconlist_icon{ display: none !important; }
.two-column-grid .icon-style-2 .avia-icon-list li a{ padding: 10px !important; }

.law-grid-content { padding-top: 75px; }
.law-grid-content .av-special-heading-tag { font-size: 36px !important; }
.law-grid-content .avia_textblock p{ font-size: 22px; line-height: 1.6; }

.table-content p {
    margin: 5px 0px;
}
.table-content strong {
    width: 30px;
    height: 30px;
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    background: #01589d;
    border-radius: 50%;
    color: #ffffff !important;!i;!;!i;!;
}

.table-content div {
    width: calc(100% - 30px);
    padding-left: 20px;
    color: #000000;
}

.table-content {
    align-items: center;
    display: flex;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    width: 100%;
    justify-content:center;
}
.table-content.red strong {
    background: #991a37;
}
.table-content.green strong {
    background: #509e60;
}
.table-content.orange strong {
    background: #ec5322;
}
.custom-table {
  width: 100%;
  overflow-x: auto;
}

.custom-table table {
  width: 100%;
  border-collapse: collapse;
}

.custom-table td {
  padding: 10px;
  word-break: break-word;
}
.frm_error_style{ display: none !important; }

.year-book-list ul{ column-count: 10; column-gap: 10px; }

@media (max-width: 1400px) {
.table-content div {
    padding-left: 10px;
}
}
@media screen and (max-width: 1365px) {
	  .custom-table {
		  overflow-y:scroll;
			display: block;
	  }
	.table-content{	flex-wrap: nowrap !important;}
	.custom-table table {
		width: 100%;
		display: block;
		overflow-x: auto;
		white-space: nowrap;
		overflow-y: scroll;
	}
	.year-book-list ul{ column-count: 7; column-gap: 10px; }
}
@media (max-width: 767px) {
    .banner-head-law a.next-slide, 
    .banner-head-law a.prev-slide {
        width: 22px !important;
    }
	.blue-bg-image {
    min-height: auto !important;
}
	.blue-bg-image .container{width:100% !important; max-width:100% !important;}
	.map-area-table table td {
    padding: 10px !important;
}
	.table-content strong {
    width: 25px;
    height: 25px;
}
	.custom-table td {
    width: 100% !important;
    display: block !important;
}
.custom-table tr {
    WIDTH: 100%;
    display: block;
}

.custom-table tbody td {
    display: block !important;
	border-left:none !important;
}

.custom-table table {
    background-color: #eeeeee;
    max-height: 500px;
    overflow: auto;
}
	.custom-table tbody {
    width: 100% !important;
    display: block !important;
}
	
	.page-banner-main.banner-head-law .slide-btn{ font-size: 14px; letter-spacing: 1px; margin-bottom: 20px; padding: 5px 10px; }
	.law-grid-content .av-special-heading-tag{ font-size: 28px; }

	.year-book-list ul{ column-count: 3; column-gap: 10px; }

            var parts = text.split("|");
            $(this).html(parts[0] + ' <span>' + parts[1].trim() + '</span>');
        }
    });
	

	setTimeout(function() {
    $("li.stu-search-toggle").addClass("active");

    $('.minitext').html(function(_, html) {

});
